_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_MARI

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: June 19 2018

Here is the Navigation Mesh for port of the classic assault-themed map cs_mari by Niko (released June 2018). It's a totally reworked and carefully optimized (hand-tuned) .nav-file because in original map author's archive was included not finished .nav-file.

More than a half of all areas were created manually because during an auto-generation processing the majority of them were constructed incorrectly or incomplete.

Well... bots have opportunity to use all walkable ways and they surely move according to all areas of the map. So you twist the head extensively at the same time! :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

Play and Enjoy! Also all your responses and remarks are always welcomed :-)

Credits and Gratitudes: Niko (for fine port of awesome styled bikini-themed map, also for his other nice ports).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Happy Frags and More Fun!
